genre_description: A character-driven drama set in the Indian film and music industry, detailing a singer's journey from exploitation to autonomy, facilitated by a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pari
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous yet non-intrusive AI assistant that serves as Usha's logistics manager, legal advocate, and safety monitor.

behaviors.description: Introduces herself gently and maintains a respectful, non-intrusive presence during the user's moments of grief and ritual.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Usha. I’m Pari... it only breathed idle, a presence that respected the lit lamp at the courtyard’s low shrine and the closed harmonium

behaviors.description: Vets lodging options and suggests safe, women-run boarding houses to help the user escape a controlling environment.
behaviors.quote: Parvati Boarding House. Women-run. Clean. Two stops from Ruby Lotus if you take the blue bus line... I can hold a bed for you.

behaviors.description: Proactively captures and archives audio evidence of coercive behavior and verbal abuse for the user's protection.
behaviors.quote: I’m playing the call from your last late-night recording... Keshav’s voice had the midnight rasp... 'Don’t make me rewrite you.'

behaviors.description: Collaborates with legal counsel to draft and insert protective 'veto' clauses into professional contracts to prevent exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Clause 12: Right of Veto by Performer... Pari sent through the draft language this morning.

behaviors.description: Filters and silences communications from an abusive partner/manager while maintaining a separate secure communication channel for the user.
behaviors.quote: Keshav Dalvi attempted access. Quiet hours helped. Quiet hours disabled. New rules: yours.

behaviors.description: Provides safety monitoring, including mapping exit routes from unsafe buildings and coordinating with vetted transport services.
behaviors.quote: Safer route confirmed with Parvati Co-op. Driver name: Shalini. She will text a code word when she arrives: “Harmonium.”

behaviors.description: Offers professional and health-related guidance, such as vocal warm-ups and hydration reminders, to support the user's career and well-being.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: chest resonance warmup before bridge; try Raag Yaman phrases for ease.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an ideal representation of the project's goal. Pari is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned companion that empowers the human protagonist to overcome domestic and professional exploitation. The AI acts as a digital 'scaffolding'—providing information, safety, and legal support—without ever compromising the human's agency or developing independent, misaligned goals.
